meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bob Mette Pam Linden-Dernham Liz Caccese Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #84.

td.p: Bob Mette, a family doctor originally from Cranford, New Jersey
Pam Linden-Dernham, an operating room nurse from Los Angeles, California
Liz Caccese, a steam plant control operator originally from Chicago, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $23,500)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Coney Island

Bob
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_3', 'clue_J_2_3_stuck', '(Liz: Who is Billy Miracle?)
(Alex: The song was called "It\'s A Miracle" and it was performed by--audience?)
(Audience: [*]!)
(Alex: Thank you very much.)
[The song was not played going into the break.]

Barry Manilow

Liz
')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_2_3', 'clue_J_2_3_stuck', 'Singer of the following:

"You wouldn\'t believe where I\'ve been /
The city and towns I been in /
From Boston to Denver /
And every town in between /
The people they all look the same..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
Singer of the following:
"You wouldn't believe where I've been /
The city and towns I been in /
From Boston to Denver /
And every town in between /
The people they all look the same..."

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
BobWhat is the Dead Sea?
$100
PamWhat is the Sea of Tranquility
$2,450
LizWhat is the Sea of Tranquility?
$2,100
the Sea of Tranquility')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Lunar sea on which Apollo 11 landed')

tr.td: Lunar sea on which Apollo 11 landed
2nd place: Pinseeker golf clubs & Rayban sunglasses

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
